amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to increase ICE appropriation by $34,860,000 and decrease the Office of the Secretary and Executive Management by $39,860,000 for the purposes of re-establishing the VOICE office within ICE.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Santos amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Santos amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Santos amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
